welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cedar Hills, where the majestic views of Mount Hood and the charming small-town atmosphere await you. We hope you will take some time to explore our city and discover all the unique experiences it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Provo Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights at Provo Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly constructed terminal serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
